name: Xtreme City: Car Race Stunts
description:
Show off your racing skills and stunt racing skills. You can become a champion racer in Xtreme City: Car Race Stunts.

As an addictive and realistic racing game, it has various exciting and challenging missions. Offers multiple sports cars and stunts to get a realistic car simulation using a nitro accelerator experience. The Racing Game performs some of the ultimate racing stunts on different tracks for fun. Driving at full speed, become a real professional stunt drifter!

Use the most crazy racing stunts to show off your car driving skills and racing stunt skills. Enjoy the most incredible racing game through a powerful impossible track.

Features:
- Highly realistic racing game
- HD graphics 3D graphics
- Practical driving feeling with extra pleasure
- Simple and smooth control
- Stunning visual effects
- Dangerous and tricky path
- Challenging missions
